# Contributing to SCLM

Thank you for your interest in SCLM! üß†

## Important Notice

**SCLM is Proprietary Software** under a dual-licensing model. Please review the [LICENSE](LICENSE) before contributing.

By contributing to this project, you agree that your contributions will become the property of Ame Web Studio and will be licensed under the same terms as the rest of the project.

## How to Contribute

### Reporting Bugs

1. Check existing issues first
2. Include:
   - Python version
   - PyTorch version
   - GPU type (if applicable)
   - Minimal reproducible example

### Suggesting Features

1. Open a discussion first
2. Describe the use case
3. Explain expected behavior

### Code Contributions

**Note:** Due to the proprietary nature of SCLM, code contributions require signing a Contributor License Agreement (CLA).

Contact [info@amewebstudio.com](mailto:info@amewebstudio.com) before submitting substantial contributions.

## Development Setup

```bash
# Clone (requires access)
git clone https://github.com/Volgat/sclm.git
cd sclm

# Create virtual environment
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # Linux/Mac

# Install in dev mode
pip install -e ".[dev]"

# Run tests
pytest tests/ -v
```

## Code Style

- Follow PEP 8
- Use type hints
- Write docstrings (Google style)

## Questions?

üìß Email: [info@amewebstudio.com](mailto:info@amewebstudio.com)
